TermDesc:
- In the Sworn Allegiance state, time is temporarily stopped, and Resonator switching is disabled. Only Sublime is the Sun - Sunborne, Sublime is the Sun - Everbright Protector, and Dodge can be performed in the Sworn Allegiance state. Mid-air Attacks can be performed in this state while airborne.
- In the Sworn Allegiance state, press or hold Normal Attack to cast Sublime is the Sun - Sunborne. Augusta can walk on water without consuming STA in this state.
- When Sworn Allegiance ends, cast Sublime is the Sun - Everbright Protector automatically.
- Performing environmental, gameplay, or other interactions ends Sworn Allegiance without triggering Sublime is the Sun - Everbright Protector.
